entry: Enter on breakout of defined micro-range; enter immediately (do not wait for bar close).
stop: Hard stop ~0.02 below consolidation low or recent swing low.
target: Measured move (consolidation height * 1-2) or default 2:1 R:R.
confirmations: Avoid when OI shows opposing pressure
trailing: Optional: trail to VWAP or 9EMA; otherwise use hard stop.
notes: Emphasizes VWAP and OI; visual rules may be image annotated in PDF images.
